title: Energy Minister Addresses Al Bateen Majlis on the Impact of Fuel Price Deregulation Read more ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Energy of the United Arab Emirates ) Tuesday, October 13 , 2015 Tuesday, October 13, 2015 HE Suhail Al Mazrouei, the Minister of Energy , delivered a lecture at Al Bateen Majlis on the dimensions of deregulation of fuel
